channel.title: Menus on The Radnor Arms
channel.description: Recent content in Menus on The Radnor Arms

item.title: Weekday (inc. Sat)
item.description: Radnor Menu Starters Homemade Soup(s) - Starter: £5 / Main: £7 Served with rustic bread and butter. Please ask at the Bar for the choice(s). Breaded Garlic Mushrooms (V) - £5 Served with salad garnish and homemade garlic dip. Halloumi Fries (V) - £6 Served with a salad garnish and sweet chilli dips. Breaded Whitebait - £6 Served with a salad garnish and garlic mayonnaise. From the Pub Board 10oz Rump Steak - £16 Served with onion rings, coleslaw, mushroom & peas (or salad)

item.title: Weekday Takeaway
item.description: Weekday Takeaway Menu The takeaway service is only from 5.30pm - 6.30pm Burgers & Sausages Bacon Double Cheese Burger £7.00 Beef Burger £3.00 Cheese Burger £3.50 Southern Chicken Burger £5.00 Southern Chicken Bacon/Cheese Burger £7.00 Spicy Bean Burger(vg) £6.00 From the Sea Please note that fish may contain bones.

item.title: Sunday Lunch
item.description: Sunday Menu Starters Homemade Soup - Starter: £5 / Main: £7 Served with rustic bread and butter. Please ask at the Bar for the choice(s). Breaded Garlic Mushrooms (V) - £5 Served with salad garnish and homemade garlic dip. Filled Potato Long Boats - £5 Choice of “Bacon and Cheese”, “tuna and cheese” or “Roast Peppers and Cheese” (V) served on a bed of salad. Breaded Whitebait (GF) - £6 Served with a salad garnish and garlic mayonnaise.

item.title: Sunday Takeaway
item.description: Sunday Takeaway Menu The takeaway service is from 12pm - 12.30pm and 2pm - 2.30pm (orders must be made by 2pm Saturday) Roasts Half Roast Chicken (on the bone) £12.00 Roast Beef £13.00 Roast Lamb £13.50 Pumpkin, Mushroom & Chestnut Roast (v/gf) £10.50 Mushroom, Brie,Hazelnut & Cranberry Wellington £13.50 All Sunday Roasts come with roast potatoes, roast parsnips, homemade Yorkshire Pudding, sage & onion stuffing, cauliflower cheese, and a selection of vegetables.

item.title: Wine List
item.description: Wine List White Wine Coleridge Hill Sauvignon Blanc Pino Grigo Chenin Blanc Rose Wine Pino Grigo Blush Zinfandel Blush Red Wine Malbec Merlot Shiraz Rioja Reserva Sparkling Wine Prosecco Vino Spumante Dessert Wine Monbazilliac

item.title: Beers
item.description: Beers The Radnor Arms stocks a range of draft and bottled beers (as well as wide range of spirits, wines and soft drinks). Our current draft beers are listed below. Guest draft Real Ales (between 1 - 2 on at a time) alter every few weeks, sourced from a variety of local and other extensive brewers. Draft Lagers Amstell (3.8 ABV) Fosters (4.
